content: this legal case involves a civil suit between two parties referred to as ip and nd regarding the division of succession assets ip filed a lawsuit against nd and nd filed a counterclaim requesting the termination of joint ownership of the assets and equal division between them the court partially satisfied nds counterclaim and ordered the division of assets including a sum of 1082303 euros the court also set a claim for funeral expenses in favor of ip the court determined that half of the estate amounting to 471972 euros should be given to nd both parties have the right to submit an appeal within 30 days the text also provides a summary of the circumstances of the case including the death of the deceased person and the actions taken by both parties regarding the inheritance the court reviewed evidence and arguments made decisions on various expenses and issued a judgment the losing party has the option to appeal the judgment the legal process involved the filing of a complaint court review discovery pretrial conference trial and issuance of a judgment the case is ongoing with the parties presenting arguments and the court making decisions based on evidence the total amount in dispute is 1046229 euros the defendant claims half of a certain amount and the plaintiff agrees with the claim the court will review the counterclaim and the amount claimed by the defendant the defendant also claims funeral expenses and the plaintiff argues they should be part of the defendants claim the court has examined evidence and made decisions on various expenses the courts decision was based on relevant laws and regulations the court has determined the composition of succession assets and approved certain expenses the court has also considered the income and expenses of the deceased person and determined the amount to be taken from their account the court ruled in favor of the plaintiff and dismissed the plaintiffs claim against the defendant the defendants counterclaim was partially satisfied both parties are responsible for their own legal expenses

metadata.cost: Each party covers own procedural costs, unspecified amounts
